meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Zowee! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: When she saw the fireworks, she exclaimed, 'Zowee!'
meanings.sent3: Zowee! I can't believe how fast that squirrel is climbing the tree!
meanings.sent4: The news of the treasure discovery made everyone shout 'Zowee!'
meanings.sent5: Zowee! The roller coaster ride was thrilling and unexpected!

meanings.definition: A sound made to show admiration or amazement.
meanings.sent1: The audience gasped at the magician's zowee.
meanings.sent2: She let out a loud zowee when she saw the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: The little boy's zowee echoed through the room as he opened his birthday present.
meanings.sent4: The zowee of the crowd filled the stadium as the singer hit a high note.
meanings.sent5: The zowee of the crowd was deafening as the fireworks lit up the sky.
